origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenEnergyAPI.get_financing_cases', 'description': 'This function retrieves financing cases for green energy projects within a specified time range and project type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'time_range', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time range for which to retrieve financing cases, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}, {'name': 'project_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of project, e.g., green_energy, renewable_energy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cases', 'description': 'A list of financing cases for the specified project type and time range.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenEnergyAPI.get_financing_cases, 它的参数输入如下: 'time_range'是'last_year', 'project_type'是'green_energy'.
